title: Swamp dragon scales
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Swamp dragon scales |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | All                 |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 7                   |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 7                   |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +7                  |
| Grants                                                         | rPois               |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5                   |

|   |                                                                              |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The scales of a swamp dragon. It confers resistance to poison on its wearer. |

**Swamp dragon scales** are a moderately light body [armour](/Armour "Armour") that provides [poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

This item has a 33% chance to to generate when you slay a [swamp dragon](/Swamp_dragon "Swamp dragon").

## Desirability

Swamp dragon scales are a light armour with relatively high AC, a direct upgrade to plain [ring mails](/Ring_mail "Ring mail") and [scale mails](/Scale_mail "Scale mail"). They are a good option for casters and [EV](/EV "EV")-based characters.

The poison resistance is great in [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest"), [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit"), and [the Swamp](/The_Swamp "The Swamp"), where poison is a major threat. It can occasionally be useful in other places, such as [Zot](/Zot "Zot"). However, even if you already have rPois, this armour can be good for its defensive merit.

The next heaviest scales are [fire](/Fire_dragon_scales "Fire dragon scales") and [ice dragon scales](/Ice_dragon_scales "Ice dragon scales"). These offer more AC, but are significantly heavier than swamp dragon scales. In addition, both fire and ice scales make you vulnerable to the opposite element, while swamp offers no vulnerability. Overall, any of the three choices can be viable to complete a 3-rune game - which you should pick will vary from character to character.

## History

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), this item was known as [swamp dragon armour](/Swamp_dragon_armour "Swamp dragon armour"), and were obtained by [enchanting](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") [swamp dragon hide](/Swamp_dragon_hide "Swamp dragon hide").

html:
Swamp dragon scales

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Swamp dragon scales
Size to wear All
Armour Class 7
Encumbrance rating 7
Maximum Enchantment +7
Grants rPois
Time to Wear 5


The scales of a swamp dragon. It confers resistance to poison on its wearer.

Swamp dragon scales are a moderately light body armour that provides poison resistance.

This item has a 33% chance to to generate when you slay a swamp dragon.

Desirability

Swamp dragon scales are a light armour with relatively high AC, a direct upgrade to plain ring mails and scale mails. They are a good option for casters and EV-based characters.

The poison resistance is great in Spider's Nest, Snake Pit, and the Swamp, where poison is a major threat. It can occasionally be useful in other places, such as Zot. However, even if you already have rPois, this armour can be good for its defensive merit.

The next heaviest scales are fire and ice dragon scales. These offer more AC, but are significantly heavier than swamp dragon scales. In addition, both fire and ice scales make you vulnerable to the opposite element, while swamp offers no vulnerability. Overall, any of the three choices can be viable to complete a 3-rune game - which you should pick will vary from character to character.

History

  • Prior to 0.19, this item was known as swamp dragon armour, and were obtained by enchanting swamp dragon hide.

'''Swamp dragon scales''' are a moderately light body [[armour]] that provides [[poison resistance]].

This item has a 33% chance to to generate when you slay a [[swamp dragon]].

==Desirability==
Swamp dragon scales are a light armour with relatively high AC, a direct upgrade to plain [[ring mail]]s and [[scale mail]]s. They are a good option for casters and [[EV]]-based characters.

The poison resistance is great in [[Spider's Nest]], [[Snake Pit]], and [[the Swamp]], where poison is a major threat. It can occasionally be useful in other places, such as [[Zot]]. However, even if you already have rPois, this armour can be good for its defensive merit.

The next heaviest scales are [[Fire dragon scales|fire]] and [[ice dragon scales]]. These offer more AC, but are significantly heavier than swamp dragon scales. In addition, both fire and ice scales make you vulnerable to the opposite element, while swamp offers no vulnerability. Overall, any of the three choices can be viable to complete a 3-rune game - which you should pick will vary from character to character.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], this item was known as [[swamp dragon armour]], and were obtained by [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanting]] [[swamp dragon hide]].
